title: Lordhermes
author: Lordhermes
content: Hello Guys,I'm looking for a legit telegram bot company that run the following services in a telegram public group.The bot will, 1. Welcome new members maybe after every 10 new members 2. Highlight the services/products of the group.3. Post our various social media handles consequently.4. Remove/ban members that spam the group with links.OthersBots will strictly be regulated to our own policy and term of use, let me know in the comment section if you know such legit company.I am willing to pay for such bots if we negotiate properly.Thanks

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: There are many options for you here@MissRose_bot@GroupButler_bot@combot@GroupHelpBotYou can even use multiple, if one fails to do all the task.

comments.author: babo
comments.body: Quote from: Lordhermes on July 29, 2022, 10:34:44 PMHello Guys,I'm looking for a legit telegram bot company that run the following services in a telegram public group.The bot will, 1. Welcome new members maybe after every 10 new members 2. Highlight the services/products of the group.3. Post our various social media handles consequently.4. Remove/ban members that spam the group with links.OthersBots will strictly be regulated to our own policy and term of use, let me know in the comment section if you know such legit company.I am willing to pay for such bots if we negotiate properly.Thankshello i do a bot do like u wantused by- kucoin italy- the rock trading- tokhit - other big cryptocurrencies group (10k members)ping me in pm or telegram (blackout314) or other waysthis bot is tested, used internal spamlist and CAS list

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I'm familiar with what edgycorner has posted like. I will post their links here so you can access them right awayhttps://t.me/MissRose_bothttps://t.me/GroupButler_bothttps://t.me/combotI'm not familiar with the grouphelp bot. But I hope this could help. It's basically what you included what they need to do etc. Let us know if you have already made or have decided to hire to create or use the suggested bots.
